page.title: 14The Village Hall in Clun
page.content: The village hall in Clun is called the Memorial Hall. The building consists of a large hall, a small room which is called the committee room and an area between these where a stage can be erected. These can be made into three separate areas. There is also a kitchen which doubles as a bar. There are toilet facilities and one changing room. Events and activities which take place regularly are: dances, parties, discos, badminton, keepfit, youth club, whistdrive, hall committee meetings, Clun Ladies group meetings and bingo.Irregular events are wedding parties, concerts and cookery classes. Surrounding the Memorial Hall are playing fields, part of which is marked out as a football pitch for Clun Valley F.C. There is a play area for children which has swings and other play apparatus.
